error.invalid_slave_ids: Slave IDs must be comma-separated list of ints
error.slave_cannot_connect: Failed to connect to additional slave

forcible_charge.name: Forcible Charge
forcible_charge.description: Forcible Charge of the battery for a certain time

forcible_discharge.name: Forcible Discharge
forcible_discharge.description: Forcible Discharge of the battery for a certain time

forcible_charge_soc.name: Forcible Charge to a SoC level
forcible_charge_soc.description: Forcible Charge of the battery to a certain State of Charge level

target_soc.name: Target SoC
target_soc.description: State of Charge that must be reached

forcible_discharge_soc.name: Forcible Discharge to a SoC level
forcible_discharge_soc.description: Forcible Discharge of the battery to a certain State of Charge level

target_soc.name: Target SoC
target_soc.description: State of Charge that must be reached

stop_forcible_charge.name: Stop the forcible charge or discharge
stop_forcible_charge.description: Cancel the running forcible charge command

reset_maximum_feed_grid_power.name: Set Active Power Control to Maximum Feed Grid Power
reset_maximum_feed_grid_power.description: Set Active Power Control to the default Unlimited mode

set_di_active_power_scheduling.name: Set Active Power Control to 'DI active scheduling'
set_di_active_power_scheduling.description: Set Active Power Control to 'DI active scheduling'

set_zero_power_grid_connection.name: Set Active Power Control to 'Zero power grid connection'
set_zero_power_grid_connection.description: Set Active Power Control to 'Zero power grid connection'

set_maximum_feed_grid_power.name: Limit the power fed to the grid
set_maximum_feed_grid_power.description: Sets Active Power Control to 'Power-limited grid connection' with the given wattage

set_maximum_feed_grid_power_percent.name: Limit the power fed to the grid to percentage
set_maximum_feed_grid_power_percent.description: Sets Active Power Control to 'Power-limited grid connection (%)' with the given percentage

periods.name: Periods
periods.description: One period per line. For Huawei LUNA2000 batteries: '<start time>-<end time>/<days effective>/<charge>', with 1=Monday, 7=Sunday (example: '12:00-14:00/1234567/-'). For LG RESU batteries: '<start time>-<end time>/<electricity price>' (example: 13:00-14:00/0.50)

periods.name: Periods
periods.description: One period per line. Format: '<start time>-<end time>/<days effective>/<power>W', with 1=Monday, 7=Sunday. Example: '00:00-23:59/1234567/2500W'.

set_fixed_charge_periods.name: Set Fixed Charge Periods
set_fixed_charge_periods.description: Sets Fixed Charge and Discharge Periods

periods.name: Periods
periods.description: One period per line. Format: '<start time>-<end time>/<power>W'. Example: '12:00-15:59/-1000W'.
